answers.author: Paul Scher
answers.text:
In my research of the subjects of merit based pay and pay for performance for firefighters has turned up an applied research project form 2004 entitled Pay for Fire Fighter Performance, Certification, and Education (http://1.usa.gov/lYX0Lc), and a effectiveness assessment from 2009 called Performance Based Pay: Assessing the Effectiveness of Columbus Fire Rescue’s Step Pay Plan (http://1.usa.gov/kHpl06). I hope these documents will be of some assistance to you.

author: Eric Norenberg
text: Oberlin has a combination Fire Department that includes five full-time employees and around 20 part-time firefighter/EMS employees.  We are interested in sample pay for performance or merit-based pay plans that include fire departments such as ours please.  Thanks!
title: Merit Pay for Firefighters
